item.title: About
item.description: ​ I am a light game enthusiast with poor gastrointestinal function. I go to bed early intermittently and stay up late. ​ This is the second time to build my blogs since my website was not running two year ago (2019). Last year (2020), work tasks takes over my life completely. There was a month when I worked 160 hours of overtime and the average overtime hours were more than 120 hours in other four month.
